prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a round body and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that can swim quickly and has a musical croak.
Generate a frog-like creature that can manipulate water and has a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon with a blue skin tone and distinctive yellow markings.
Imagine a powerful amphibious Pokemon that thrives in wet environments.
Design a creature that can camouflage itself in its watery habitat.
Show me a Pokemon with large eyes and an energetic personality.
